channel.title: philstar.com - RSS Headlines
channel.description: Philippine News for the Filipino Global Community

item.title: BMP: Workers without unions at most risk from 'voluntary' wage, benefit cuts amid pandemic
item.author: Franco Luna
item.description: "You're really laying off workers and reducing salaries now, in the middle of an emergency? These are extraordinary times and nobody asked for this," BMP chairperson Luke Espiritu said in Filipino.

item.title: DOH logs 258 new COVID-19 cases as first week of re-opened economy ends
item.author: Franco Luna
item.description: The number of active COVID-19 cases in the Philippines stands at 9,918 as of Sunday.

item.title: Palace: Arrival of new warship a 'breakthrough' in upgrading Navy
item.author: Alexis Romero
item.description: The ship, which will be named BRP Jose Rizal, arrived in Subic, Zambales on Saturday after its five-day maiden voyage from Ulsan, South Korea.

item.title: Duterte urges Muslims to be 'agents of change' in Eid'l Fitr message
item.author: Alexis Romero
item.description: "Harnessing the best of our capabilities and perspectives, let us be agents of change in our communities as we contribute to the enlightenment of our nation," Duterte said.

item.title: Online petition for ABS-CBN franchise gets 1M signatures in 24 hours
item.description: “We are among the thousands who are worried and will be affected if ABS-CBN shuts down. We all have families who depend on our work,” the petition read.

item.title: Cancer survivor from the Philippines among COVID-19 deaths on NYT front page
item.description: Around the world, 5,401,612 have fallen sick to the pathogen, leading to 343,804 deaths since the virus was recorded in Wuhan, China.

item.title: Navy’s first missile-capable warship arrives in Philippine waters
item.description: Its commissioning is set for June 19, the birthday of the ship’s namesake.

item.title: Bong Go: Rationalize bed capacity in DOH hospitals
item.author: Cecille Suerte Felipe
item.description: As the health crisis brought about by the coronavirus disease 2019 pandemic continues to challenge the healthcare sector, Sen. Bong Go emphasized the need to make the process of increasing the bed capacity and capabilities of the hospitals run by the Department of Health easier and more systematic.

item.title: Oil prices to go up this week
item.author: Danessa Rivera
item.description: Motorists should brace for a massive fuel price increase next week as global crude prices continued to soar.

item.title: SM MOA Arena transformed into mega swabbing facility
item.description: The SM Mall of Asia Arena in Pasay City has recently been converted into a COVID-19 mega swabbing facility.
